text: Eduard Admetlla i Lázaro (10 January 1924 – 8 October 2019) was a Spanish scuba diver, underwater cameraman and photographer. He was the designer of a self-contained underwater breathing apparatus (scuba) and also was the tester of scuba diving gear for the Nemrod trade mark. He was born in Barcelona. He wrote five books describing his underwater experiences: La llamada de las profundidades,Admetlla Lázaro, Eduard. La llamada de las profundidades. Editorial Juventud, 1957. Mis amigos los peces,Admetlla Lázaro, Eduard. Mis amigos los peces. Bruguera, 1983. . ¡Fondo!,Admetlla Lázaro, Eduard. ¡Fondo!. Plaza & Janes, 1976. . Tierras y profundidadesAdmetlla Lázaro, Eduard. Tierras y profundidades. Bruguera, 1983. . and Mi aventura submarina.Admetlla Lázaro, Eduard. Mi aventura submarina. Barcelona: Grijalbo, 1984. . Admetlla i Lázaro died on 8 October 2019 in Barcelona at the age of 95.Mor el pionier del submarinism català Eduard Admetlla ==References== Category:Writers from Barcelona Category:Spanish photographers Category:Inventors Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Eduard Admetlla i Lázaro
